attributes.action: Make Changes To The NEW 9-1 GCSE Syllabus As A* Graded Students Are Struggling
attributes.additional_details:
Source 1 : http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-32831905 
As you can visually perceive in source 1 even exam regulators are verbally expressing that "new maths GCSEs too hard"

Source 2: http://www.gazette-news.co.uk/news/14794660.Headteacher_slams_new_GCSE_rating_system_for_being_a_misrepresentation_of_results/?ref=rss 
As you can visually perceive in source 2 Coggeshall Headteacher says "new GCSE league tables to be published today will not reflect the achievement of his school's pupils."
attributes.background: The reason why I have decided to commence a petition is due to the new 9-1 Maths GCSE where 2017 GCSEs takers will be the first year to attempt the new Maths, most students are finding it arduous and are not being able to reach their target grade despite being a high achiever.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to change.
